scripts.setup:
# Copy configuration files
cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" .
cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" ./app
cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" ./core
cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" ./runtime
cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/AGENTS.md" .
cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/AGENTS.md" ./CLAUDE.md
cp -r "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.claude" ./.claude

# Install dependencies
bun i
bun run build:shared
scripts.run: bun run check && echo "formatting done, typecheck ok, now running the backend"
